name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 36
description: An iconic running shoe returns as the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 36 offers more perforations and a designed mesh upper that combine to achieve breathability in strategic areas. A thinner collar and heel tongue help maintain a sleek profile while keeping comfort intact. Exposed Flywire cables provide a snug fit at any speed.

name: Nike Revolution Next Nature
description: The beloved favorite of all, Nike Revolution, arrives in its sixth version. Redesigned for those who want to combine a routine of training, walking, and running, or for you who seek comfort with a lot of style.

name: Nike Air Max
description: The Nike Air Max line features athletic shoes known for their visible Air cushioning unit, providing responsive comfort and impact protection. With a variety of styles and breathable uppers, they offer versatility for running, walking, and casual wear, while their iconic design elements make them popular among athletes and sneaker enthusiasts alike.

name: Nike Nike Downshifter 12
description: The Nike Downshifter 12 is a lightweight and breathable running shoe with a cushioned midsole for comfort and support. It features a durable outsole for traction and stability, making it ideal for runners seeking both performance and style.
